Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'W-wait! The Corrupted followed the peasants into this carriage!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aristocrat A', 3: "Dammit! Don't come over!"}
{2: 'Commoner', 3: "Ah... I... I'm sorry, but we don't want to die..."}
{2: 'Aristocrat B', 3: 'Who cares?! Who let these scums in?!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I let them in. We are all residents of this train, are we not?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Who do you think you are?! Going around and doing things like this... Come to think of it, you're the one who deployed Sophia too!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: "She's the leader... But, you may have crossed the line with your actions this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'R-right? Aston, my lord! Please get rid of them!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: "What's done cannot be undone. If we let the commoners out now, it will only allow more Corrupted in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: '...Tsk, what a useless leader!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hey, you! Show some respect! I've had enough of you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'What? Are you peasants defying us?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: "Changyu, think before you speak. I'll give you some mechanic guards, go take care of those Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "...Understood. I'll beat them all out of the train!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Lord Aston, you're too generous to a Construct... Hmph, never mind that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Babylonia still hasn't given us a reply, we can't afford to wait any longer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'We can just give the Ascendants the merchandise now, right?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: "There's still some time until the deadline...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Aston, what are you worrying about? You're not waiting for that Jamilah girl's approval, are you?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: "I'm just worried about safety issues. We can't all be so radical, now can we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: "If we receive right of abode in Babylonia, then we can continue to enjoy our current lifestyle without fearing the Punishing Virus. Doesn't that suit our needs more?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "...I'll wait a bit more, but only because you're the one asking, my lord.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'But not all of the aristocrats are patient like me.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory136.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, the help request was sent by the Construct with the ponytail.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Something must have happened.', 3: '66', 4: "Maybe something's wrong with a carriage ahead.", 5: '66'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Changyu doesn't ask for help unless it's necessary. I have to return.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I quite appreciate your efficiency. Let's speed up our pace.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Right, let's fight!", 4: '2'}
